## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G16310](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G16310)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>UCH1</u>
- **Gene Name:** 
- **Description:**   Peptidase C12, ubiquitin carboxyl-terminal hydrolase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [uch1-1 uch2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Accumulated less chlorophyll than wild-type.  Smaller and more compact rosettes than wild-type. More lanceolate cauline leaves.  Less fertile.  Under short day conditions, the double mutant develops a less branched primary inflorescence.
